AGENT_MGMT.DESCRIPTION: An agent is a member of your customer support team who can view and respond to user messages. The list below shows all the agents in your account.

LIST.404: There are no agents associated to this account
LIST.TITLE: Manage agents in your team
LIST.DESC: You can add/remove agents to/in your team.
LIST.NAME: Name

ADD.TITLE: Add agent to your team
ADD.DESC: You can add people who will be able to handle support for your inboxes.

NAME.LABEL: Agent Name
NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Please enter a name of the agent

EMAIL.LABEL: Email Address
EMAIL.PLACEHOLDER: Please enter an email address of the agent

API.EXIST_MESSAGE: Agent email already in use, Please try another email address

FORM_CREATE.ROUTING_CONDITION_PLACEHOLDER: Determine when the AI Bot should hand over the chat to a human agent. After that, the chat status will change to Open and appear in the Chat Assigned tab.

AGENT_MGMT.TEXT_KNOWLEDGE_PLACEHOLDER:
Enter important information about your business, products, services, or policies here.

Example: Our store is open Monday to Saturday, from 8 AM to 5 PM. For returns, customers must include a proof of purchase within 7 days.
